official_title: To amend the Forest Resource Conservation and Shortage Relief Act of 1990 to extend the restrictions on exports of unprocessed timber originating from Federal lands from the 100th to the 93d meridian.

summary.text: Amends the Forest Resources Conservation and Shortage Relief Act of 1990 to prohibit: (1) the sale for export of unprocessed timber from Federal lands west of the 93rd (currently, 100th) meridian in the contiguous 48 States; and (2) the purchase for export of such timber from Federal lands west of the 93rd (currently, 100th) meridian in the 48 contiguous States which will be used as a substitute for timber from private lands which is exported by the purchaser (thus widening the region to which such restrictions apply).

titles.title: To amend the Forest Resource Conservation and Shortage Relief Act of 1990 to extend the restrictions on exports of unprocessed timber originating from Federal lands from the 100th to the 93d meridian.
